TOPICT(6D)                                           TOPICT(6D)





NAME
       topict - convert an IRIS image to Macintosh PICT format

SYNOPSIS
       topict inimage out.pict

DESCRIPTION
       topict  converts  an IRIS image file into Macintosh PICT
       format.



IRIX 6.5                  May 5, 2004                TOPICT(6D)
